long_description: . Edited by Jack O. Olofson. Softcover; 102 pages; black-and-white maps. Outdoor Books & Maps Inc.; copyright 2007. 77 routes sure to appeal to riders of all skill levels. Rides featured in Aspen, Boulder, Colorado Springs, Estes Park, Fort Collins, Vail, Saguache, Steamboat Springs, Summit County and Winter Park. Each ride is described by distance, time, elevation gain, difficulty and riding surface; also includes a map reference.
short_description: Colorado Biking Trails features casual rides through the cities, scenic rides on mountain roads and challenging single track.
